prompts: Create a playful water-type Pokemon that loves to perform tricks in the ocean.
Make a cute, blue aquatic creature with a cheerful expression and a big pink nose.
Show me a Pokemon that can swim gracefully and has vibrant blue and white colors.
Imagine a water Pokemon that loves to entertain others with its playful nature.
Design a small, adorable Pokemon with flippers and a bubbly personality.
Generate a Pokemon that is both an entertainer and a water master, perfect for battles.
Give me a lively Pokemon that thrives in ocean habitats and has lovely blue hues.
